", "answer": "By developing undeveloped and unutilized Chaur land for fish-based integrated aquaculture, the scheme aims to significantly increase fish production and productivity. "}, {"question": "What is the role of the District Fisheries Officer? ", "answer": "The District Fisheries Officer is responsible for identifying suitable Chaur land, preparing beneficiary lists, conducting awareness campaigns, forming groups/clusters, and overseeing the implementation of the scheme.
